parameters.name: DestCidrBlockList
parameters.description: The destination CIDR blocks of the routes.

parameters.name: DestinationCidrBlock
parameters.description: The destination CIDR block of the route. IPv4 and IPv6 CIDR blocks are supported.

parameters.name: MaxResult
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: **1** to **100**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: NextHopId
parameters.description: The ID of the next hop.

parameters.name: NextHopType
parameters.description:
The type of the next hop. Valid values:

*   **Instance** (default): an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance
*   **HaVip**: a high-availability virtual IP address (HAVIP).
*   **VpnGateway**: a VPN gateway
*   **NatGateway**: a NAT gateway
*   **NetworkInterface**: a secondary elastic network interface (ENI)
*   **RouterInterface**: a router interface
*   **IPv6Gateway**: an IPv6 gateway
*   **Attachment**: a transit router

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. Valid values:

*   You do not need to specify this parameter for the first request.
*   You must specify the token that is obtained from the previous query as the value of NextToken.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the route table.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: RouteEntryId
parameters.description: The ID of the route that you want to query.

parameters.name: RouteEntryName
parameters.description:
The name of the route entry.

The name must be 1 to 128 characters in length and cannot start with `http://` or `https://`.

parameters.name: RouteTableId
parameters.description: The ID of the route table that you want to query.

parameters.name: ServiceType
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to host the route. If the parameter is empty, the route is not hosted.

Set the value to **TR**, which specifies that the route is hosted by a transit router.
